name: truemates-connect
description: - **Node.js and Express.js**: For building the backend server and handling HTTP requests. - **JWT**: For user authentication and token generation. - **Sequelize**: As an ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) for interacting with the PostgreSQL database. - **GCP Storage**: For storing media files like photos. - **PostgreSQL**: As the relational database for storing user data, posts, etc.
